Verses: 1 dhevane, Umadhu Naamaththinimiththam Ennai Ratchiththu, Umadhu Vallamaiyinaal Enakku Niyaayanjeyyum.
2 dhevane, En Vinnappaththaikkettu, En Vaayin Vaarththaigalukkuch Sevikodum.
3 anniyar Enakku Virodhamaai Ezhumbugiraargal; Kodiyar En Piraananai Vaangath Thedugiraargal; Dhevanaith Thangalukku Munbaaga Niruththi Nokkaargal. (selaa.)
4 idho, Dhevan Enakkuch Sagaayar; Aandavar En Aaththumaavai Aadharikkiravargalode Irukkiraar.
5 avar En Saththurukkalukkuth Theemaikkuth Theemaiyaich Sarikkattuvaar, Umadhu Saththiyaththinimiththam Avargalai Nirmoolamaakkum.
6 urchaagaththudan Naan Umakkup Baliyiduven; Karththaave, Umadhu Naamaththaith Thudhippen, Adhu Nalamaanadhu.
7 avar Ellaa Nerukkaththaiyum Neekki, Ennai Viduviththaar; En Kan En Saththurukkalil Needhi Sarikkattudhalaik Kandadhu.
